link in.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to connect with another idea, statement, type of work etc, especially in a way that is useful
link in.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: This point links in with our earlier discussion.
link in.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to happen at the same time as something else
